 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אָלַץ‎</span>] **verb Pi\`el** ==urge== (Aramaic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhLQAiAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAAAAAAALAAAAAAtACIAAAJ+jI+py+0Po5wHAGQv3SEb24HclGmfOH7q4p1depYMikZ11bLmJie5Duu5HDeOcDdDjoSPYtCpgKaYUSUMJ5VeqcNro4TUEl/WWE2cBKvXJrSODae5fT8WDrucV6f6KN/LVwZI1DcYImj4hphItziYU8eIBRIpaVZpeZm5yVEAADs=">, Samaritan <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">) 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַתְּאַלֲצֵהוּ‎</span> [[Judg.16.6|Judg 16:6]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֵצִיקָה לוֺ בִדְבָרֶיהָ‎</span>). <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַלְקוּם‎</span> see I.  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַל‎</span>.
